website_summaries.verdict: Fun-looking kids sparring gloves that are inexpensive and give you a high level of comfort.
pros: Kids will love the bright red or blue color of these sparring gloves, as well as the cartoon character displayed on them
Works well for both sparring and for competition for youngsters
Gloves should last until your child outgrows them
cons: Not really made for older kids, like teenagers

customer_reviews.title: Excelente!
customer_reviews.text: For the price is not bad, very good material, excellent gloves, my little son loves!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel D.

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Synthetic Kids Gloves
customer_reviews.text: I bought these gloves for my 4 year old because he loves hand to hand combat. We bought my son a little punching bag and he spares with me. These gloves are more in the range of a 6-11 year old. These are probably in the small or size 7 glove size. The foam is solid not soft filled like cheaper boxing gloves. Compared to my leather fairtex gloves the build is nearly identical. These are more kick boxing gloves than boxing gloves.
customer_reviews.author: SV

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gloves for a 7 year old! Great wrist support and decently comfortable for kids.
customer_reviews.text: These gloves were a present for my 7 year old son's birthday and he loved them. They fit perfectly and keep his little hands and wrists protected while he punches his new punching bag! They are even easy enough for him to put on himself, so that is a plus. I thought the color of them was cute too. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bengal mom

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect gloves for little boxers
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect gloves for little boxers; my use for them was as a gift to an 80 year-old woman that had gotten into a kicking fight at her nursing home. a good natured jest at getting into fights and using something less harmful than hard shoes - it worked! she keeps them ready on her wheelchair as she navigates the halls.
customer_reviews.author: johnK

customer_reviews.title: Raising a future champion...
customer_reviews.text: I'm just not sure which brother it will be. The boys (5 & 7) still not the crap out of each other, but now they do it with softer hands (and they know there are rules, like no hitting below the waist). Have two brothers ever fought each other in a boxing ring for a belt? If not, then it may happen in about 20 years, and when it does, the Cheerwing 4 oz gloves will get plenty of credit as they are their first ever boxing gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Familyof5

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome for the money, and are surprisingly well-made. Comfortably fit my 6 year old and they also fit my 4 year old well enough for her to use them. Quality was so great on the first pair, I bought another set. I liked that the padding was well-placed and that they had good liners, they breathe well and provide correct form for punches. Awesome gloves for kids and in general, thanks!
customer_reviews.author: R Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Great for my 4 year old son
customer_reviews.text: We got these as well as the Everlast 4318 punch mitts for my son who needed an appropriate outlet for his aggression. These have been great for him and it's made my other kids (6yr old and 2yr old) interested in having their turn with them. These don't fit the 2yr old (I didn't expect them to), but they fit both the 4 and 6 yr olds and it's fun for them!
customer_reviews.author: cbfitz

customer_reviews.title: It's been 3 yrs now and the 2 pairs are still very good
customer_reviews.text: I train my boys at least once a week and it's been 3 years since they have this gloves and still rocking fine. I have to change mitts, and speed balls couple of times while the gloves are still remains. This is the best kids gloves out there.
customer_reviews.author: J. C. B.

customer_reviews.title: So far these have been a lot of fun for my kids (even my 3 1/2 year old) ...
customer_reviews.text: So far these have been a lot of fun for my kids (even my 3 1/2 year old) I got them for my 9 year old and he loves sparing with daddy. His hands measure 6" long by 3 1/4" wide and they fit with a little room to grow. I don't know how these would hold up if they were used regularly for training but just for goofing off around the house I don't have any negative feedback.
customer_reviews.author: TheBoylans

customer_reviews.title: Great boxing gloves for kids!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this so my 6 year old son could play around with our punching bag. I have to admit this is a very high quality product! I wasn't expecting these gloves to be made as well as they are! I wouldn't hesitate to recommend to anyone who has kids wanting to try boxing or using a punching bag!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew K.

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Gloves
customer_reviews.text: Got these boxing gloves for my 5 year old so we could keep busy during all this Covid-19 nonsense. They were reasonably priced and they work like a charm. He absolutely adores them and is now beating the crap out of me on a daily basis. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Sinister

customer_reviews.title: My 2 yr old grandson LOVES to 'fight'. These ...
customer_reviews.text: My 2 yr old grandson LOVES to 'fight'. These protect US! haha He loves these and can put them on himself.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara L.

customer_reviews.title: Love these gloves!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the punching bag for my 4 y.o. grandson and thought these boxing gloves would be a great addition. He loves them! They are so cute. Easy for him to put on and take off. Nice quality. Definitely would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie R.

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly great quality
customer_reviews.text: As a couple of other reviews, I was extremely surprised of the good quality of this gloves, fits perfect on my 7 YO daughter. We use for training at home but I'm sure that will fit any boxing classes needs. Trust me, I have a great quality REYES boxing gloves and this guys are pretty good
customer_reviews.author: Luis Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Nice kid gloves for a nice price.
customer_reviews.text: Obviously, these gloves are a stepping stone to more durable, higher quality gloves. However, for children practicing boxing, kickboxing or Muay Thai every-now-and-then, maybe once or twice a week—these will do nicely. Given the price, I expected cheap craftsmanship and material. To my surprise, they’re quite nice little gloves. Now, don’t expect some Cleto Reyes stitching and leather, but you should come to expect some very good basic construction. Nice, snug fit on my 9 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive pair of gloves that work well for training. I use them to train my 10 year old daughter. The gloves fit snug on her hand. I would not recommend these gloves for any kid over ten. I have owned them for less than a month so I can't say if they will be durable over prolonged use.
customer_reviews.author: BIG WILL

customer_reviews.title: Better quality than everlast kids gloves! Great product
customer_reviews.text: I was a little concerned when I ordered these thinking they would be cheaply made China item. I was so happy when I received them. They are great quality and fit my 6 year old nephew perfectly. They were his favorite gift. We liked them so much we ordered them for our son over his nice quality everlast gloves. We will order again when/if needed. Pros Velcro closure for tight or loose fit Great quality Realistic look and feel Not bulky
customer_reviews.author: Alec and Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great gifts for kids to be active
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these gloves from my five-year-old at eight year old and my 4 year old nephew. I put them on sometimes even though I'm a grown woman they do fit my hands very light my five-year-old son loves it he uses it all the time especially with me punching mitts.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Box

customer_reviews.title: Gloves stay on
customer_reviews.text: They fit on my 3 years old hands. He swings his arms and moves around so much but gloves don’t come off. It is light weight so he can keep throwing punches for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: E & K

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: my son loves his sparring gloves to play with his older brother and dad! Fun gifts for littler ones
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: maybe 2 sizes up would be best.
customer_reviews.text: Gloves say 5-7..but this runs really small..our 7 year old couldn't get it pass his knuckles. maybe 2 sizes up would be best.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: These are so great for kids
customer_reviews.text: These are so great for kids. My son's are 4 and 7 and they absolutely love them. They use them all the time with dad.
customer_reviews.author: Diane & Armando

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: Not high quality but not bad , they should improve the wrist support as well ,not suitable for kids just wanting to box for fun.
customer_reviews.author: Haitham

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Thinner than expected but they work well. My daughter loves "beating up" on her older brother with them lol
customer_reviews.author: Keely

customer_reviews.title: Bought these for my 6yo son so he can practice ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 6yo son so he can practice it at home with his dad. Paired them with Punch Mitts.
customer_reviews.author: WADA

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: These are well built and have lots of padding. My twin grandsons can now pummel each other without inflicting pain and bruises on each other. They also can throw them at each other with out causing injury to their brother. They like them.
customer_reviews.author: mhs

customer_reviews.title: It was the perfect Christmas present.
customer_reviews.text: It was the perfect Christmas present. They are great quality. He loves them. We also got him something to hit and his siblings thanked me for that :)
customer_reviews.author: Hermione

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Impresssed
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old son uses these almost every day ( for 6 months )for his Karate practice and they have held up great.
customer_reviews.author: J.Rader

customer_reviews.title: Great overal
customer_reviews.text: This is great for the price - you can’t go wrong my son loved them !!! I can’t say anything course it’s priced low !!
customer_reviews.author: Hicham

customer_reviews.title: Toddler Loves Them!
customer_reviews.text: Oversized for smaller toddler but they make them work. Perfect for 5-10years! Durable.
customer_reviews.author: JUNGLE Rocks

customer_reviews.title: Good toy
customer_reviews.text: Don’t expect too much. The quality is just so-so. My kid is happy to play with it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: They do the job
customer_reviews.text: Not use frequently enough to talk about durability, but overall no complaint.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: My order came on time as promised. My nephew loves his gloves. There super cute & very durable. There a good for for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great for kids
customer_reviews.text: well built, good enough for my 5 year old son who was jealous of his brother and his 30 dollar gloves. but really, most people who box for fun dont need professional grade gloves, adults and children alike. these gloves work for kids for sure. not toys, these are low cost, functional gloves for the basics/children
customer_reviews.author: shawn

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Perfect got for my 3 year old grandson . He loved using it on dummy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love em!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. 3 year old loves them. We were scared that they would be too big like the rest of the brands but these work great. He’s little so he’s not punching too hard so not sure on the durability but so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Kalisse

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality
customer_reviews.text: The little boxing gloves weren't the best thing for the child I bought them for. They were difficult for him to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids glove fits my 4yr old.
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old uses them for MMA/BJJ classes. Fits her tiny hands well. It's a kids glove feels kinda on the cheap side compared to my other kids Dtown gloves.
customer_reviews.author: ShinWoo

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great fun with my little training buddy! For a kids glove, the price to quality ratio is great!
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves for kids
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my 7 year old grandson to use with his ninja punching bag and they fit well and he feels like a real boxer.
customer_reviews.author: GrannyO

customer_reviews.title: Wow, very nice, light weight, boxing gloves for kids
customer_reviews.text: The quality of these gloves is pretty impressive for the price. I was expecting really sloppy construction, but they seem really well put together. They are very light weight, which is perfect for my 5 and 6 year old kids to use without wearing out too fast. They use these on a wavemaster punching bag, to protect their knuckles. Not much more to say, other than I've been impressed with these so far. I'll try to come back at some point in the future if I experience any troubles. Otherwise, I highly recommend these for kids. Oh, and the wavemaster punching bags are great too!
customer_reviews.author: Dracula

customer_reviews.title: My son is 5 years old and he is taking ...
customer_reviews.text: My son is 5 years old and he is taking Tae Kwon Do classes. He practices in the house with the gloves and he loves them, they fit perfectly and they are very light weight.
customer_reviews.author: William and Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Little big bit works
customer_reviews.text: Son loved them! He’s 5 and they were a little big.
customer_reviews.author: Lisha_421

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 3yr old & he absolutely loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Muse

customer_reviews.title: will recommend
customer_reviews.text: good material, no bad for price it is only for practice so alright item
customer_reviews.author: alonso

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: We've only had the gloves for a few days, but they definitely save my kids' hands from getting beat up when they are hitting my 70 lb boxing bag. They fit well on my (small) 7 and 9 year olds, though they do make for sweaty hands after just a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: VioletRazer

customer_reviews.title: small
customer_reviews.text: These are small. Does not fit my 10 year old but does fit my 6 year old. Kind of hard to put on as well but they still love to use these gloves to play in.

customer_reviews.title: the quality, comfort.
customer_reviews.text: My 2 yr old toddler saw my nephews playing witb their boxing gloves, and he felt in love with boxing therefore my gusband and I decided to order him a small, comfortable pair of gloves. We are absolutely pleased with this item, as they aren't heavy, They are great quality and very comfortable for my baby. I absolutely recomend this item 100%

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves awesome quality

customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a friend's son. They fit perfect and he loved them!

customer_reviews.title: Love them

customer_reviews.title: Just what the doctor ordered!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 pair of these for 5-yr. old twin boys, to avoid facial disfigurement and broken fingers. The boys loved them, knew immediately what they were for, and really enjoy thumping on each other, with no damage! Seem well made and are very functional.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Smith

customer_reviews.title: was very happy and surprised by the quality
customer_reviews.text: very solidly made - fo the $$ I expected them to seem much cheaper. was very happy and surprised by the quality. fits our 5 children from ages 2 to 7 very well

customer_reviews.title: Nice youth gloves, fit very well.
customer_reviews.text: My kids loved these. Useful way to get their energy out. Fit well and the Velcro holds well.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I'm a kickboxer and the kids always want to join me in practice. There are absolutely perfect for them to run drills and practice on our bag at home. The kids seem pleased with the fit and have all said they're very comfortable.

product_meta.title: Cheerwing Kids Boxing Gloves 4oz Training Gloves for Youth and Toddler Punching Mitts Kickboxing Muay Thai Gloves
feature_bullets: These cartoon boxing gloves are suitable for child Grappling and Striking in both training and competition, such as MMA, Muay Thai, Kickboxing, Taekwondo, Sparring, Focus pads, Punch bags, Punch Mitts.
Made of high-quality PU leather and EVA foaming, make these gloves are easy to clean and durable for long-term use.
Elastic wrist strap allows for a more customizable fit while providing superior wrist support, easy to wear and take off for toddler.
Gloves Size: 9 x 6.3 inch; Unit Weight: 4oz / pcs.
Suitable for Age 5-10 Years old children and youth, 4 colors available for boys or girls.
